item.title: Teenage Engineering 刚刚发布了一辆售价为250美元的玩具车。
item.description:
Teenage Engineering, the Swedish electronics firm, is known for its beautiful but pricey products—the bulk of which amount to functionalist art. Need a $1600 aluminum desk? TE’s got you covered. How about a $2,000 set of singing, wooden dolls? Again, the company is there to serve. We also wouldn’t have the Nothing…

item.title: 巫师系列的作者安德烈·萨普科夫斯基非常高兴Netflix支付他的租金。
item.description:
The Polish author behind The Witcher series is well known for his unflinching honesty about the legacy his work now has—especially in a world where Netflix has transformed that work into a streaming sensation. But how does he feel now the streamer is spinning out its Witcher world? Let’s just say, it moved him.

item.title: 令人讨厌的热屏障问题威胁着NASA几十年来首次载人登月之旅的推迟。
item.description:
Nearly a year after an uncrewed Orion splashed down in the Pacific Ocean, NASA anticipates it still needs a few more months to resolve a lingering issue with the capsule’s heat shield before a crew can ride on board.

item.description:
The Hollywood Reporter has confirmed Scream franchise star Melissa Barrera has been removed from Scream VII after social media posts referencing the Israel-Hamas war. Barrera played Sam Carpenter, the Scream series’ reboot lead in Scream V and Scream VI.

item.title: 前 OpenAI 高管宣布 ChatGPT 语音已对所有人开放
item.description:
OpenAI’s former President and Chairman Greg Brockman announced that ChatGPT Voice is now available to all users Tuesday afternoon. Users can now speak with ChatGPT, and it will talk back, announced Brockman on X, just days after OpenAI’s leadership was ousted.

A team of researchers may have found an effective treatment for one of the more common symptoms of long covid: a chronically changed sense of smell. In a small study, the team found that many patients improved after undergoing a minimally invasive procedure often used to treat pain and circulation problems. In some…

With the strikes over, work is back up and running in a galaxy far, far away. First up, Star Wars: Ahsoka creator Dave Filoni has been promoted to a much bigger creative role. Second, he and his team are finally able to speak about all the huge revelations at the end of the latest Star Wars Disney+ show.

Binance founder Changpeng Zhao (CZ) will step down from his CEO duties and plead guilty to criminal charges, paying a $50 million fine, according to court documents made public Tuesday. The Department of Justice is expected to announce a $4 billion settlement with Binance this afternoon, putting an end to an…

The center of our galaxy is a menagerie of exotic objects; a supermassive black hole, clouds of hot gas, and giant stars that can help inform the origin story of much of the universe. Using the Webb telescope, scientists got to see this chaotic region of the Milky Way in a different light, revealing new features and…

item.description:

No checked bags, less and less legroom, charging for wifi when it costs the airline the same amount whether or not you use it — it’s all part of a strategy that experts call “calculated misery,” where companies make your experience more unpleasant on…

item.title:
对于那些已经拥有一切的音乐家来说，当金钱不是问题时，以下是一些最佳礼物选择：
1. 定制音乐乐器：为他们定制一把专属的乐器，可以让他们感受到独特的音乐体验。
2. 高级录音设备：购买一套顶级的录音设备，能够帮助他们实现卓越的录音效果，并提升音乐作品的质量。
3. 音乐工作室：为他们打造一个专属的音乐工作室，里面配备顶级设备和舒适的创作环境，使他们能够更专注地创作出精彩的音乐作品。
4. 参加顶级音乐会或音乐节：购买VIP门票，让他们亲身体验世界一流的音乐会或音乐节，与顶级音乐家共同享受音乐盛宴。
5. 音乐之旅：安排一次豪华的音乐之旅，让他们有机会亲临全球各地的音乐圣地，领略不同文化背景下的音乐魅力。
6. 音乐导师或大师班课程：邀请著名音乐导师为他们提供一对一指导，或者报名参加大师班课程，提升他们的音乐技巧和艺术水平。
这些礼物将能满足那些追求卓越、无尽创造力的音乐家，让他们在音乐的世界中更加充实、愉悦。
item.description:
If the musicians in your life are anything like me, they’ve plunged headfirst into significant debt in their relentless pursuit of the gear to fuel their artistic aspirations.

item.title: These Bats Seem to Use Their Huge Junk to Have Weird Sex
item.description:
It looks like flying isn’t the only unusual thing that bats can do compared to other mammals. New research has found a bat species whose males use their large penises like an arm during sex. Rather than have penetrative sex, these bats and their genitals seem to engage in close-contact “kissing”—a method widely seen…

item.description:
The US Justice Department seeks $4 billion from Binance to end a years-long investigation into the world’s largest cryptocurrency exchange, according to Bloomberg. Negotiations are reportedly underway that could subject Binance co-founder and CEO Changpeng Zhao (aka CZ) to criminal charges in the US.

item.title: Your Favorite PBS Cooking Shows Now Share a Dedicated FAST Channel
item.description:
You don’t have to be a chef or even know how to cook to enjoy the shows gathered on the new PBS Food FAST channel—but if you binge it long enough, you might pick up some kitchen mojo by osmosis. Starting today, you can find the free 24/7 channel in the U.S. on Amazon Freevee, Plex, and Roku.
